Interface IManagerService

All Known Implementing Classes:
ManagerService
public interface IManagerService
Interface for services related to an HDB Manager. Provides functionalities for managing projects, registrations, applications, enquiries, and generating reports.

  • Method Details

    • hasProjectConflict

      boolean hasProjectConflict(LocalDate openingDate, LocalDate closingDate)
      Checks if there is a conflict with existing projects during the specified date range.
      Parameters:
      openingDate - the proposed opening date of the project
      closingDate - the proposed closing date of the project
      Returns:
      true if a conflict exists, false otherwise

    • createProject

      Project createProject(String projectName, String neighbourhood, int room2, int price2, int room3, int price3, LocalDate openingDate, LocalDate closingDate, int slots, User user)
      Creates a new HDB project with the provided details.
      Parameters:
      projectName - the name of the project
      neighbourhood - the neighbourhood where the project is located
      room2 - the number of 2-room flats
      price2 - the price of 2-room flats
      room3 - the number of 3-room flats
      price3 - the price of 3-room flats
      openingDate - the opening date for the project
      closingDate - the closing date for the project
      slots - the total number of available slots
      user - the manager creating the project
      Returns:
      the created Project object

    • checkAuthForProject

      boolean checkAuthForProject(Project project)
      Checks whether the current manager has authorization over the specified project.
      Parameters:
      project - the project to check authorization for
      Returns:
      true if the manager is authorized, false otherwise

    • editProject

      void editProject(int choice, Project project)
      Edits the specified project based on a provided option.
      Parameters:
      choice - the attribute to edit (e.g., name, dates, prices)
      project - the project to be edited

    • shiftVisibility

      void shiftVisibility(Project project)
      Toggles the visibility status of the specified project.
      Parameters:
      project - the project to update

    • findById

      Registration findById(int id)
      Finds a registration by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the registration
      Returns:
      the Registration object if found, otherwise null

    • getRegistrations

      List<Registration> getRegistrations()
      Retrieves all project registrations for the manager.
      Returns:
      a list of Registration objects

    • approveRegistration

      void approveRegistration(Registration registration)
      Approves the specified project registration.
      Parameters:
      registration - the Registration object to approve

    • rejectRegistration

      void rejectRegistration(Registration registration)
      Rejects the specified project registration.
      Parameters:
      registration - the Registration object to reject

    • getApplications

      List<Application> getApplications()
      Retrieves all submitted applications for the manager's project.
      Returns:
      a list of Application objects

    • findApplicationByNric

      Application findApplicationByNric(String nric)
      Finds an application based on the applicant's NRIC.
      Parameters:
      nric - the NRIC of the applicant
      Returns:
      the Application object if found, otherwise null

    • approveApplication

      void approveApplication(Application application)
      Approves the specified application.
      Parameters:
      application - the Application object to approve

    • rejectApplication

      void rejectApplication(Application application)
      Rejects the specified application.
      Parameters:
      application - the Application object to reject

    • getWithdrawals

      List<Application> getWithdrawals()
      Retrieves all applications that have requested withdrawals.
      Returns:
      a list of Application objects marked for withdrawal

    • approveWithdrawal

      void approveWithdrawal(Application application)
      Approves the withdrawal request for the specified application.
      Parameters:
      application - the Application object requesting withdrawal

    • rejectWithdrawal

      void rejectWithdrawal(Application application)
      Rejects the withdrawal request for the specified application.
      Parameters:
      application - the Application object requesting withdrawal

    • getApplicantsForReport

      List<Applicant> getApplicantsForReport(String filterType, String filterValue)
      Retrieves a list of applicants for report generation based on a specific filter.
      Parameters:
      filterType - the type of filter (e.g., age, status)
      filterValue - the value to filter by
      Returns:
      a list of Applicant objects matching the criteria

    • getEnquiries

      List<Enquiry> getEnquiries()
      Retrieves all enquiries submitted for the manager's project.
      Returns:
      a list of Enquiry objects

    • checkAuthForEnquiry

      boolean checkAuthForEnquiry(int id)
      Checks if the manager is authorized to reply to the specified enquiry.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the enquiry
      Returns:
      true if authorized, false otherwise

    • replyEnquiry

      void replyEnquiry(int Id, String reply)
      Submits a reply to a specific enquiry.
      Parameters:
      Id - the ID of the enquiry
      reply - the response message
